text: lil_man_lukas & I doing happy dance thnx to chef_jr_rusgrove. JR’s a fabu chef, dear friend, and all around great guy! Despite the temporary closure of his popular restaurants he’s maintaining his signature positive… https://www.instagram.com/p/B-2SAA3DlTI/?igshid=12up7ev8rtexa
the folks at the infatuation have been absolutely crushing with how they've responded to restaurant closures. i have always been so impressed with their creativity and it's showing now more than ever

All I’m saying is, you may think you understand the implications of massive bar/restaurant closures, but it will be devastating to both the economy and the overall cultural makeup of the entire country. This will be a mile marker in American culture, that should scare all of us

Guajillo in Arlington is the latest local restaurant to take its insurer to court. Its attorneys are using case law from 9/11 when the government mandated the closure of Reagan National and U.S. Airways argued biz interruption insurance should kick in.
